name: AstroGolf!
description:
In this casual smartphone game, you can visit 7 planets, each one with its own peculiarities. For every planet there are different golf fields, try to complete them all with the smallest number of throws. The game difficulty is given by the fact that physical phenomena are happening while golfing. 

In this prototype, you can try one level for each planet. The difficulty of these stages is really heterogeneous, as they are still a work in progress. 

If you find bugs or you have suggestions, please let us know through the in-game window that appears after each level completion, thank you!
